channel.title: Creative Spark
channel.itunes:author: Optimus Prime
channel.itunes:summary:
Unlock the secrets of creative mastery in this daily exploration of artistic innovation and problem-solving. Each episode of Creative Spark delves into a single, powerful technique used by accomplished artists, designers, and writers to break through creative blocks and generate fresh ideas. From time-tested methods to cutting-edge approaches, discover how creative professionals across disciplines harness their imagination and craft.
Drawing inspiration from Austin Kleon's concept of "stealing like an artist," this series examines how great creators build upon existing ideas to forge something new. Through concise, focused episodes, learn practical tools and mindsets that can transform your creative practice, whether you're a seasoned professional or just beginning your artistic journey.
